titleStmt.title: Some observations upon the life of Reginaldus Polus Cardinal of the royal bloud of England sent in a pacquet out of Wales, by G.L. gentleman, and servant to the late Majesty of Henrietta Maria of Bourbon, mother to the present King.
titleStmt.author: Joyner, William, 1622-1706.

notesStmt.note: Wing attributes authorship to William Joyner.
Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
